tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Sanjay pai has God gifted hands.. We were never sure that our mother could walk properly for the rest of her life.. Sanjay pai made both the knee replacement such smoothly and currently my mother is leading a normal life without any knee pain

tags: None
review: Although my appointment was rescheduled at 1 PM, Doctor was good to examine the patient at 11:30AM and left the hospital after successful consultation at about 12:30PM.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
If u see I don’t normally write feedback unless I am disappointed. Because good reviews can be bought and written by relatives but bad reviews r mostly genuine. 
Anyways so I took my mom today to see this doc. She has severe knee pain. So once he checked her knee and X ray he suggested that we could do 2 things. Surgery or Medication. So he said first go watch the AV. We did. Once we went bk to him he said ok so let me knw once u r ready. We said we did not want surgery yet but we wanted suppliments for time being till we make a decision. He said no supplements can help. I told him he said so and to give pain killer. To that he said go to a Family doctor. Seriously only if doctors knew how it feels to be on the other side patients would recover  half there itself by just doctor’s consoling them. Anyways. The hospital “Apolo specially “ in Jayanagar was also very disappointing. No co Ordination. Not recommending at all

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My mother in-law got her both legs knee replacement surgery done with Dr Sanjay Pai.Operation was done successfully but she was getting tiching in operated knee area hence thought of getting consulting Doctor Pai for this issue...When we consulted Doctor Sanjay Pai ...before listening my mother in law health problem... In hurry burry he asked us to get XRay done... As per his advice we got X-ray done and we went to show the report, Doctor Pai said both the knees are fine.. but when my mother In law said she is getting itching in both the knees in operated area...Doctor Sanjay Pai replied in a rude way that "For that u should go to skin specialist " if u have caugh will you come to me" and showed the door to go out....my mother in law was getting itching only in knee operated area not on other part of body....I felt she asked a relevant question.... I felt Mr Sanjay Pai is very rude and unprofessional and doesn't give time to patients to explain their health issues.
I dont recommend him. 
Till u get operated u ll be treated royaly and  any doubts will be answered but once after operation is done your treatment will be different ...
I don't recommend him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: The doctor saw patient for 5 seconds and then sent her to spine and neuro section. For a back pain problem* ********* ******* Totally not worth spending our hard earned money on this fellow

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: Consultation fees for Dr. Pai was too high at Rs 750 + Rs 500 for excercise demo! ***** * ***** ** *** ******** ******* ** ******* *** ******* ** ***** ***** I had gone to him to consult regarding my back and shoulder pain but he rather suggested me for a knee surgery besides sending me to some exercise demo persons for my back and shoulder pain issues at an additional fees of Rs 500.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Doctor friendliness,
review: Explained the issue properly in an understandable way. Quick diagnosis. No unnecessary medication and it is limited to the need.

tags: Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: Senior Veteran in joint replacement treatments. Gives Confidence to patients. Popular doctor for knee surgery

review: *** ** *** **** ****** ** ****** Gives lot of confidence to the patients.. we are happy to suggest his name to everyone who wants to go for knee replacement..
